question_en: What are early symptoms of dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ke ibtidaai alamat kya hain?
answer_en: Early symptoms include sudden high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, muscle and joint pain, nausea, vomiting, and fatigue.
answer_ru: Ibtidaai alamat me achanak tez bukhar, shadeed sar dard, aankh ke peeche dard, joron aur pathon me dard, ulti, ghulati aur thakan shamil hain.

question_en: Does dengue always start with fever?
question_ru: Kya dengue hamesha bukhar se shuru hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, dengue typically starts with sudden high fever along with body pain and headache.
answer_ru: Haan, dengue aam tor par achanak tez bukhar ke sath shuru hota hai jisme jism dard aur sar dard shamil hota hai.

question_en: Is headache common in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me sar dard aam hai?
answer_en: Yes, intense headache—especially behind the eyes—is a common symptom.
answer_ru: Haan, shadeed sar dard khas tor par aankh ke peeche aam alamat hai.

question_en: Why does dengue cause pain behind the eyes?
question_ru: Dengue me aankh ke peeche dard kyu hota hai?
answer_en: The virus triggers inflammation that irritates the tissues behind the eyes, causing characteristic pain.
answer_ru: Virus soozish paida karta hai jo aankh ke peeche ke hisson ko mutasir kar ke dard paida karti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause back pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue se kamar dard hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, muscle and joint pain—including back pain—are common because of inflammation.
answer_ru: Haan, pathon aur joron me dard, jis me kamar dard bhi shamil hai, soozish ki wajah se hota hai.

question_en: Why do joints hurt in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me jor kyu dard karte hain?
answer_en: Dengue triggers inflammation in muscles and joints, causing severe aches.
answer_ru: Dengue pathon aur joron me soozish paida karta hai jis se shadeed dard hota hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause stomach pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pait dard hota hai?
answer_en: Mild abdominal discomfort may occur early, but severe abdominal pain is a warning sign requiring urgent care.
answer_ru: Shuru me halka pait dard ho sakta hai lekin shadeed pait ka dard khatwarning alamat hai aur foran tawajjo chahiye.

question_en: Is nausea normal in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ulti ya ghulati aam hai?
answer_en: Yes, nausea and vomiting are common because dengue affects the digestive system.
answer_ru: Haan, ulti aur ghulati aam hain kyun ke dengue hazme ke nizaam ko mutasir karta hai.

question_en: Does dengue always cause vomiting?
question_ru: Kya dengue me hamesha ulti hoti hai?
answer_en: Not always, but many patients experience nausea or occasional vomiting.
answer_ru: Hamesha nahi, lekin bohat se mareez ghulati ya kabhi kabhi ulti mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Is rash common in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me rash aam hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, a skin rash often appears between days 2–5 of illness.
answer_ru: Haan, din 2–5 ke darmiyan jild par rash aksar zahir hota hai.

question_en: What does dengue rash look like?
question_ru: Dengue ka rash kaisa hota hai?
answer_en: It may appear as red patches or small spots, sometimes itchy.
answer_ru: Ye laal dhabbay ya chotay nishanon ki shakal me hota hai, kabhi kabhi kharish bhi hoti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause mild fever?
question_ru: Kya dengue me halka bukhar hota hai?
answer_en: Usually dengue starts with high fever, but some cases may begin mildly.
answer_ru: Aksar dengue tez bukhar se shuru hota hai, magar kuch mein halka bukhar bhi hosakta hai.

question_en: How long does dengue fever last?
question_ru: Dengue ka bukhar kitne din rehta hai?
answer_en: The fever phase typically lasts 2–7 days.
answer_ru: Bukhar aam tor par 2–7 din rehta hai.

question_en: Can dengue fever return after going down?
question_ru: Kya bukhar kam hone ke baad wapas aa sakta hai?
answer_en: It usually does not return once resolved, but the critical phase begins as fever drops.
answer_ru: Bukhar kam hone ke baad aam tor par wapas nahi aata, magar critical phase us waqt shuru hota hai.

question_en: What is the critical phase in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me critical phase kya hoti hai?
answer_en: The 24–48 hours after fever decreases when plasma leakage and warning signs may appear.
answer_ru: Bukhar girne ke 24–48 ghante critical phase hote hain jisme leakage aur khatwarning alamat samne aa sakti hain.

question_en: Why does the fever fall suddenly in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me bukhar achanak kyu girta hai?
answer_en: This is part of the illness cycle; the drop signals the start of the critical phase.
answer_ru: Ye dengue ke cycle ka hissa hai; bukhar girna critical phase ka aaghaz hota hai.

question_en: Do children show the same symptoms as adults?
question_ru: Bachon me bhi yahi alamat hoti hain?
answer_en: Yes, but children may worsen faster and require closer monitoring.
answer_ru: Haan, lekin bachon ki halat tez bigar sakti hai is liye zyada nigrani chahiye.

question_en: Can dengue cause extreme fatigue?
question_ru: Kya dengue se had se zyada thakan hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, severe fatigue is common during and after dengue.
answer_ru: Haan, shadeed thakan bimari ke duran aur baad me aam hoti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause dizziness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me chakkar aate hain?
answer_en: Mild dizziness can occur due to dehydration or fever. Severe dizziness must be evaluated.
answer_ru: Halka chakkar pani ki kami ya bukhar se ho sakta hai. Shadeed chakkar ka muaina zaroori hai.

question_en: Can dehydration happen in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pani ki kami ho sakti hai?
answer_en: Yes, due to fever, vomiting, and reduced intake. Hydration is essential.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar, ulti aur kam pani pene ki wajah se pani ki kami hosakti hai. Hydration zaroori hai.

question_en: Why is hydration important in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me pani pina itna zaroori kyu hai?
answer_en: Fluids help prevent shock, maintain circulation, and reduce complications.
answer_ru: Maye shock se bachate hain, khoon ki rawani behtar karte hain aur complications kam karte hain.

question_en: Is loss of appetite normal?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bhook kam lagna aam hai?
answer_en: Yes, appetite often decreases. Small, frequent meals are recommended.
answer_ru: Haan, bhook aksar kam hoti hai. Choti choti matra me khana behtar hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause body aches?
question_ru: Kya dengue me jism dard hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, intense body aches are one of the hallmark features.
answer_ru: Haan, shadeed jism dard dengue ki khas alamat me se hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause chills?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kapkapi hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, chills may accompany the initial fever.
answer_ru: Haan, shuruati bukhar ke sath kapkapi hosakti hai.

question_en: Do all dengue patients have rash?
question_ru: Kya har dengue mareez me rash hota hai?
answer_en: No, the rash is common but not seen in all cases.
answer_ru: Nahi, rash aam hai lekin sab me nahi hota.

question_en: Are red spots on skin a sign of dengue?
question_ru: Kya jild par laal nishaan dengue ki alamat hain?
answer_en: They can be, especially if accompanied by fever and body pain.
answer_ru: Hosakte hain, khas tor par agar bukhar aur jism dard bhi ho.

question_en: Why do some people not show symptoms?
question_ru: Kuch logon me alamat kyu nahi hoti?
answer_en: Some infections are mild or asymptomatic, depending on immunity.
answer_ru: Kuch logon me immune nizaam ki wajah se alamat bohat halki ya gayab hoti hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause sore throat?
question_ru: Kya dengue me gala dard hota hai?
answer_en: It is not typical but may occur in some patients.
answer_ru: Aksar nahi hota lekin kuch mareezon me hosakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause cough?
question_ru: Kya dengue me khansi hoti hai?
answer_en: Cough is not a main symptom; if present, evaluate for co-infection.
answer_ru: Khansi dengue ki khas alamat nahi. Agar ho to co-infection check karein.

question_en: Can dengue cause mild rashes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me halkay rash ho sakte hain?
answer_en: Yes, rash may be faint or mild in early stages.
answer_ru: Haan, shuru me rash bohat halka hosakta hai.

question_en: Is vomiting a warning sign?
question_ru: Kya ulti khatwarning alamat hai?
answer_en: Persistent vomiting is a warning sign and requires urgent care.
answer_ru: Bar bar ulti khatwarning alamat hai aur foran tawajjo chahiye.

question_en: Is bleeding a symptom of dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me khoon aata hai?
answer_en: Mild bleeding may occur, but significant bleeding is a warning sign.
answer_ru: Halka khoon aasakta hai magar zyada bleeding khatwarning alamat hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause gum bleeding?
question_ru: Kya dengue me masoodon se khoon aasakta hai?
answer_en: Yes, gum bleeding is a warning sign and needs medical evaluation.
answer_ru: Haan, masoodon se khoon aana khatwarning alamat hai aur muaina zaroori hai.

question_en: Is nosebleed common in dengue?
question_ru: Kya naak se khoon aam hai?
answer_en: It can happen in severe or warning-phase dengue.
answer_ru: Ye shadeed dengue ya warning phase me hosakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause dark stools?
question_ru: Kya dengue me siyah paikhana hota hai?
answer_en: Black or tarry stool suggests internal bleeding—seek urgent care.
answer_ru: Siyah paikhana andarooni bleeding ki nishani hai—foran tawajjo chahiye.

question_en: Can dengue affect breathing?
question_ru: Kya dengue saans par asar karta hai?
answer_en: Rapid or difficult breathing is a serious warning sign.
answer_ru: Tez ya mushkil saans lena bohat khatarnak alamat hai.

question_en: Is restlessness a warning sign?
question_ru: Kya bechaini khatwarning alamat hai?
answer_en: Yes, restlessness or irritability suggests poor circulation and requires urgent care.
answer_ru: Haan, bechaini ya chirchira-pan rawani ka masla dikhata hai aur foran tawajjo chahiye.

question_en: What is dengue shock?
question_ru: Dengue shock kya hota hai?
answer_en: A dangerous condition with very low blood pressure due to plasma leakage. It is a medical emergency.
answer_ru: Bohat khatarnak halat jisme khoon ka pressure bohat kam ho jata hai plasma leakage ki wajah se. Ye emergency hai.

question_en: Why do platelets fall in dengue?
question_ru: Platelets dengue me kyu kam hotay hain?
answer_en: The virus affects bone marrow and increases destruction of platelets.
answer_ru: Virus bone marrow aur platelets ki tabahi dono ko mutasir karta hai.

question_en: Does low platelet count always mean danger?
question_ru: Kya kam platelets hamesha khatarnak hotay hain?
answer_en: Not always. Trends and warning signs matter more than one number.
answer_ru: Hamesha nahi. Platelets ka rawayya aur alamat zyada aham hain.

question_en: When do platelets start dropping?
question_ru: Platelets kab girna shuru hotay hain?
answer_en: Usually around days 3–7 as fever declines.
answer_ru: Aksar din 3–7 me jab bukhar girta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause high heart rate?
question_ru: Kya dengue me dil ki dharkan tez hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, fever and dehydration can cause increased heart rate.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar aur pani ki kami se dharkan tez hosakti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause low blood pressure?
question_ru: Kya dengue me blood pressure kam hota hai?
answer_en: Low BP may indicate plasma leakage and needs urgent care.
answer_ru: Kam BP plasma leakage ki nishani hosakta hai—urgent care zaroori hai.

question_en: Is weakness normal in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kamzori aam hai?
answer_en: Yes, weakness is very common due to fever and inflammation.
answer_ru: Haan, kamzori bukhar aur soozish ki wajah se bohot aam hai.

question_en: How does dengue affect appetite?
question_ru: Dengue bhook par kaisa asar karta hai?
answer_en: Loss of appetite is common because the body is fighting infection.
answer_ru: Bhook kam lagna aam hai kyun ke jism infection se lad raha hota hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause muscle cramps?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pathon me jhatkay hotay hain?
answer_en: Yes, muscle inflammation may cause cramps or stiffness.
answer_ru: Haan, pathon ki soozish se cramps ya sakhti hosakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause eye redness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me aankhen laal hoti hain?
answer_en: Some patients develop mild redness due to inflammation.
answer_ru: Kuch mareezon me soozish ki wajah se halki laalmi hosakti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause swollen glands?
question_ru: Kya dengue me gardan ke gland soojte hain?
answer_en: Mild lymph node swelling may occur.
answer_ru: Halka gland soojna hosakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause dry mouth?
question_ru: Kya dengue me munh khushk hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, dehydration from fever can cause dry mouth.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar se pani ki kami munh khushk karti hai.

question_en: Is itching normal in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kharish aam hai?
answer_en: Some patients experience itching, especially with rash.
answer_ru: Kuch mareez rash ke sath kharish mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause mild swelling?
question_ru: Kya dengue me halka soojan hota hai?
answer_en: Usually no, but fluid leakage in severe cases can cause swelling.
answer_ru: Aksar nahi, magar shadeed cases me leakage se soojan hosakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause leg pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue me taangon me dard hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, muscle inflammation can make leg pain common.
answer_ru: Haan, pathon ki soozish se taang dard aam hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause chest discomfort?
question_ru: Kya dengue me seene me takleef hoti hai?
answer_en: General body aches may cause discomfort, but sharp chest pain must be evaluated.
answer_ru: Aam jism dard se halqi takleef hosakti hai, magar tez seene ka dard check karwana chahiye.

question_en: Does dengue cause sweating?
question_ru: Kya dengue me paseena aata hai?
answer_en: Yes, sweating may occur with fever spikes.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar barhne par paseena aasakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause swollen eyes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me aankhen sooj jati hain?
answer_en: Mild swelling may happen from fluid shifts, but significant swelling must be evaluated.
answer_ru: Halki soojan ho sakti hai, lekin zyada soojan ka muaina zaroori hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause shivering?
question_ru: Kya dengue me larzish hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, chills and shivering can accompany early fever.
answer_ru: Haan, shuru me kapkapi aur larzish hosakti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause red eyes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me aankhen surkh hoti hain?
answer_en: Some patients show eye redness from inflammation.
answer_ru: Kuch mareez soozish ki wajah se aankhon me surkhi mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Why do dengue patients feel extreme tiredness?
question_ru: Dengue me had se zyada thakan kyu hoti hai?
answer_en: The immune system uses a lot of energy to fight the virus.
answer_ru: Immune nizaam zyada energy istemal karta hai jis se thakan hoti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause insomnia?
question_ru: Kya dengue me neend nahi aati?
answer_en: Pain, discomfort, and fever can disturb sleep.
answer_ru: Dard, takleef aur bukhar neend ko mukhtalif taur par asar karte hain.

question_en: Does dengue cause anxiety?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bechaini hoti hai?
answer_en: Some patients feel anxious due to illness stress or dehydration.
answer_ru: Kuch mareez bemari ke pressure aur pani ki kami ki wajah se bechain mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause swollen hands?
question_ru: Kya dengue me haath sooj jate hain?
answer_en: Not typical in mild dengue; swelling suggests leakage in more severe cases.
answer_ru: Halka dengue me aam nahi; soojan ziyada tor par leakage ki nishani hoti hai.

question_en: Why does dengue cause high fever?
question_ru: Dengue me bukhar itna tez kyu hota hai?
answer_en: The body raises temperature to fight the virus.
answer_ru: Jism virus se larnay ke liye temperature barhata hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause burning eyes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me aankhon me jalan hoti hai?
answer_en: Some patients may feel eye burning due to inflammation and fever.
answer_ru: Kuch log soozish aur bukhar ki wajah se aankhon me jalan mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause swollen feet?
question_ru: Kya dengue me paon sooj jate hain?
answer_en: Not common in mild dengue; if present, evaluate for fluid leakage.
answer_ru: Aksar nahi hota; agar ho to leakage ka andaza lagaya jaye.

question_en: Does dengue cause tingling sensations?
question_ru: Kya dengue me jism me jalan ya tingling hoti hai?
answer_en: Rare but can occur due to inflammation or dehydration.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai magar soozish ya pani ki kami ki wajah se hosakta hai.

question_en: Is loss of smell a dengue symptom?
question_ru: Kya dengue me smell kam hota hai?
answer_en: Not typical; investigate for co-infection.
answer_ru: Aam alamat nahi; co-infection check karein.

question_en: Can dengue cause chills without fever?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bukhar ke baghair kapkapi hosakti hai?
answer_en: Usually chills accompany fever, not occur alone.
answer_ru: Kapkapi aksar bukhar ke sath hoti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause throat dryness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me gala khushk hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, dehydration can cause throat dryness.
answer_ru: Haan, pani ki kami se gala khushk hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause swollen lips?
question_ru: Kya dengue me hont sooj jate hain?
answer_en: Uncommon; evaluate for allergic reaction or complications.
answer_ru: Aam nahi; allergy ya complication ka muaina karein.

question_en: Does dengue cause fever spikes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bukhar kabhi kabhi bohat barh jata hai?

answer_ru: Haan, shuru me bukhar achanak barh sakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause cold hands and feet?
question_ru: Kya dengue me haath paon thanday ho jate hain?
answer_en: Cold extremities can indicate poor circulation during severe dengue.

question_en: Can dengue cause irritability?
question_ru: Kya dengue me chirr-chirrapan hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, especially in children or dehydrated patients.
answer_ru: Haan, khas tor par bachon aur dehydrated logon me.

question_en: Does dengue cause muscle stiffness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pathon me sakhti hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, inflammation causes stiffness and soreness.
answer_ru: Haan, soozish sakhti ka sabab banti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause chest tightness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me seena tang lagta hai?
answer_en: Not typical; must evaluate for complications or anxiety.
answer_ru: Aam nahi; complication ya bechaini ka muaina karein.

question_en: Can dengue cause pale skin?
question_ru: Kya dengue me chehra peela ya feeka lagta hai?
answer_en: Yes, dehydration or low circulation may cause paleness.
answer_ru: Haan, pani ki kami ya low circulation se rang feeka hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause chills after fever drops?
question_ru: Kya bukhar girne ke baad kapkapi hoti hai?
answer_en: Some may feel chills due to temperature changes and dehydration.
answer_ru: Kuch log temperature ke farq aur pani ki kami se kapkapi mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Does dengue cause joint stiffness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me joron me sakhti hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, inflammation can cause stiffness along with pain.
answer_ru: Haan, soozish se sakhti aur dard dono hosaktay hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause mild back stiffness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kamar me sakhti hosakti hai?
answer_en: Yes, muscle involvement may cause stiffness.
answer_ru: Haan, pathon ki soozish se kamar sakhti hosakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause chills at night?
question_ru: Kya dengue me raat ko kapkapi hoti hai?

answer_ru: Haan, bukhar ke farq ki wajah se raat me kapkapi hosakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause leg weakness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me taang kamzor hoti hai?

question_en: Can dengue cause rapid pulse?
question_ru: Kya dengue me nabz tez hoti hai?

question_en: Is high fever always present in dengue?
question_ru: Kya hamesha bohat tez bukhar hota hai?
answer_en: Most cases present with high fever, but not all.

question_en: Can dengue cause noise sensitivity?

question_en: Does dengue cause light sensitivity?

question_en: Why does dengue cause full-body pain?

question_en: Can dengue cause shoulder pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kandhon me dard hota hai?

question_en: Does dengue cause sinus pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue me sinuses me dard hota hai?

question_en: Can dengue cause burning skin?

question_en: Does dengue cause sharp headaches?
question_ru: Kya dengue me teekhay sar dard hotay hain?

question_en: Does dengue cause sudden fatigue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me achanak thakan hoti hai?

question_en: Can dengue cause mild diarrhea?
question_ru: Kya dengue me halki dast ho sakti hain?
answer_en: Some patients may have loose stools, but severe diarrhea is uncommon.
answer_ru: Kuch mareezon me halki dast hosakti hain; shadeed dast aam nahi.

question_en: Does dengue cause bloating?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pait phoolta hai?
answer_en: Mild bloating may occur; severe abdominal distension needs evaluation.
answer_ru: Halki phoolan hosakti hai; zyada phoolan ka muaina zaroori hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause burning feet?
question_ru: Kya dengue me paon jalte hain?
answer_en: Rare but possible due to nerve irritation.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai lekin nerve irritation se hosakta hai.

question_ru: Kya dengue me bukhar ke baghair sar dard hosakta hai?

question_en: Can dengue cause slow heart rate?
question_ru: Kya dengue me dharkan sust hosakti hai?

question_en: Does dengue affect the tongue?
question_ru: Kya dengue zaban par asar karta hai?
answer_en: Coating or dryness may occur due to dehydration.
answer_ru: Dehydration ki wajah se zaban khushk ya coated hosakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause unusual dreams?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ajeeb khwabon ka masla hota hai?

question_en: Can NS1 be negative even if I have dengue?
question_ru: Kya NS1 negative hone par bhi dengue ho sakta hai?
answer_en: Yes. After day 5, NS1 may become negative even in true dengue.
answer_ru: Haan, din 5 ke baad NS1 negative hosakta hai jabke dengue ho.

question_en: What does PCR positive mean?
question_ru: PCR positive ka kya matlab hai?
answer_en: It confirms active dengue infection by detecting viral RNA.
answer_ru: Yeh virus ka RNA pakar kar dengue ki tasdeeq karta hai.

question_en: How useful is a CBC in dengue?
question_ru: CBC dengue me kitna zaruri hai?
answer_en: CBC helps track platelets and hematocrit—key indicators for severity.
answer_ru: CBC platelets aur hematocrit ko track karta hai jo severity ka andaza dete hain.

question_en: Why does hematocrit rise?
question_ru: Hematocrit kyun barhta hai?
answer_en: It rises due to plasma leakage, indicating increased severity.
answer_ru: Leakage ki wajah se hematocrit barhta hai jo severity batata hai.

question_en: Is a falling hematocrit dangerous?
question_ru: Girta hua hematocrit khatarnak hai?
answer_en: A sudden drop with bleeding signs is concerning.
answer_ru: Achanak girna aur bleeding hona khatray ki nishani hai.

question_en: How low can platelets go in dengue?
question_ru: Platelets kitne kam hosakte hain?
answer_en: They can fall significantly, but severity depends on bleeding and clinical signs.
answer_ru: Platelets bohat kam hosakte hain, lekin severity bleeding aur alamat par depend karti hai.

question_en: Do platelets predict severity?
question_ru: Kya platelets severity batate hain?
answer_en: Trends matter more than the absolute number, especially with warning signs.
answer_ru: Number se zyada rawayya (trend) aham hota hai, khas tor par agar warning signs ho.

question_en: Can I track platelets at home?
question_ru: Kya platelets ko ghar me monitor kiya ja sakta hai?
answer_en: No, platelet counts require blood tests at a clinic or lab.
answer_ru: Nahi, platelets sirf lab test se check hote hain.

question_en: Should CBC be checked daily?
question_ru: Kya CBC roz check karna chahiye?
answer_en: During days 3–7, daily checks are recommended for symptomatic patients.
answer_ru: Din 3–7 me, symptomatic mareezon me rozana CBC behtar hota hai.

question_en: Can dehydration raise hematocrit?
question_ru: Kya dehydration se hematocrit barhta hai?
answer_en: Yes, dehydration concentrates the blood and increases HCT.
answer_ru: Haan, dehydration khoon ko ghana karta hai aur HCT barhta hai.

question_en: Is high hematocrit always severe dengue?
question_ru: Kya HCT barhna hamesha severe dengue hota hai?
answer_en: Not always. Interpretation requires symptoms, BP, and hydration status.
answer_ru: Hamesha nahi. Symptoms, BP aur hydration ke sath interpret hota hai.

question_en: What are warning signs needing hospitalization?
question_ru: Kin alamat par hospital jana chahiye?
answer_en: Severe abdominal pain, repeated vomiting, bleeding, lethargy, cold skin, reduced urine.
answer_ru: Shadeed pait dard, bar bar ulti, bleeding, susti, thandi skin, kam peshab.

question_en: What is the critical period?
question_ru: Critical period kya hota hai?
answer_en: The 24–48 hours after fever falls when complications can develop.
answer_ru: Bukhar girne ke 24–48 ghante jin me complications hosakti hain.

question_en: Is the critical phase dangerous?
question_ru: Critical phase kitni khatarnak hai?
answer_en: Yes, because plasma leakage and shock can appear.
answer_ru: Haan, kyun ke leakage aur shock hosaktay hain.

question_en: Which fluids are best for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me konsay maye behtar hain?
answer_en: ORS, water, coconut water, soups, diluted juices.
answer_ru: ORS, pani, nariyal pani, yakhni, halka juice.

question_en: Should I drink too much water?
question_ru: Kya bohat zyada pani peena theek hai?
answer_en: Drink steadily but not excessively; overhydration may be harmful.
answer_ru: Munazzam tor par piyayen, zyada nahi; overhydration nuqsan deh hosakta hai.

question_en: Can IV fluids be taken at home?
question_ru: Kya IV fluids ghar me lag sakte hain?
answer_en: No, IV fluids require medical supervision to avoid complications.
answer_ru: Nahi, IV fluids ko medical supervision chahiye.

question_en: What happens if IV fluids are too much?
question_ru: IV fluids zyada lagne se kya hota hai?
answer_en: Overhydration can cause lung fluid accumulation and worsen outcomes.
answer_ru: Zyada fluids se phaypron me maye jama hosakta hai jo nuqsan deh hai.

question_en: What happens if IV fluids are too little?
question_ru: Agar IV fluids kam lagayen to kya hota hai?
answer_en: Insufficient fluids during leakage can lead to shock.
answer_ru: Kam fluids leakage ke douran shock ka sabab ban sakte hain.

question_en: Can dengue spread person to person?
question_ru: Kya dengue aik insan se doosray ko lagta hai?
answer_en: No. It spreads only through Aedes mosquitoes.
answer_ru: Nahi, yeh sirf Aedes machar ke kaat se phailta hai.

question_en: Can I get dengue twice in one year?
question_ru: Kya aik saal me dobara dengue hosakta hai?
answer_en: Yes, if exposed to a different serotype.
answer_ru: Haan, mukhtalif serotype se dubara hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue relapse?
question_ru: Kya dengue wapas hosakta hai?
answer_en: True relapse is rare; new infection may occur from another serotype.
answer_ru: Asal relapse kam hota hai; naya serotype hone par dobara dengue hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause fluid in abdomen?
question_ru: Kya pait me maye jama hosakta hai?
answer_en: Yes, in severe dengue due to plasma leakage.
answer_ru: Haan, plasma leakage me pait me maye jama hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause fluid in lungs?
question_ru: Kya phepron me maye jama hosakta hai?
answer_en: Yes, often due to severe leakage or excess IV fluids.
answer_ru: Haan, severe leakage ya zyada IV fluids se.

question_en: Does dengue damage kidneys?
question_ru: Kya dengue gurde mutasir karta hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue may reduce kidney function; hydration is crucial.
answer_ru: Severe dengue gurde kamzor kar sakta hai; hydration zaruri hai.

question_en: Does dengue affect the heart?
question_ru: Kya dengue dil ko mutasir karta hai?
answer_en: Rarely, dengue may cause myocarditis requiring supervision.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai magar myocarditis hosakta hai; muaina zaruri hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause low oxygen?
question_ru: Kya dengue me oxygen kam hosakti hai?
answer_en: In severe cases with lung involvement or shock.
answer_ru: Severe cases me phaypron ke maslay ya shock se.

question_en: Is dizziness normal?
question_ru: Kya chakkar aam hain?
answer_en: Mild dizziness may be dehydration; severe dizziness is concerning.
answer_ru: Halka chakkar dehydration; shadeed chakkar khatarnaak.

question_en: Why do some patients worsen suddenly?
question_ru: Kuch patients achanak kyun bigartay hain?
answer_en: Worsening often occurs during critical phase due to leakage.
answer_ru: Critical phase me leakage ki wajah se halat achanak bigar sakti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause severe weakness?
question_ru: Kya dengue shadeed kamzori karta hai?
answer_en: Yes, due to fever, inflammation, and dehydration.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar, soozish aur dehydration ki wajah se.

question_en: Why is rest essential?
question_ru: Aaram kyun zaroori hai?
answer_en: Rest reduces metabolic stress and supports recovery.
answer_ru: Aaram metabolism kam karta hai aur recovery me madad deta hai.

question_en: Is bed rest required?
question_ru: Kya bed rest zaruri hai?
answer_en: Recommended during fever and critical phases.
answer_ru: Fever aur critical phase me bed rest behtar hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause appetite loss?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bhook kam lagti hai?
answer_en: Yes, appetite loss is common.
answer_ru: Haan, bhook kam lagna aam hai.

question_en: What to eat during dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kya khana chahiye?
answer_en: Soft foods, fruits, soups, ORS; avoid oily foods.
answer_ru: Halkay khanay, phal, yakhni, ORS; oily food se parhez.

question_en: Is coconut water helpful?
question_ru: Kya nariyal pani faidemand hai?
answer_en: Yes, it supports hydration but does not replace medical care.
answer_ru: Haan, hydration me madad karta hai lekin ilaj ka badal nahi.

question_en: Is glucose water useful?
question_ru: Kya glucose ka pani faidemand hai?
answer_en: Helps with energy but ORS is more balanced.
answer_ru: Energy deta hai magar ORS zyada balanced hota hai.

question_en: Does dengue require antibiotics?
question_ru: Kya dengue me antibiotics zaruri hotay hain?
answer_en: No, unless a doctor suspects bacterial co-infection.
answer_ru: Nahi, jab tak bacterial infection ka shuba na ho.

question_en: Does dengue require antivirals?
question_ru: Kya dengue me antiviral hota hai?
answer_en: No specific antiviral exists; treatment is supportive.
answer_ru: Koi specific antiviral nahi—supportive care zaroori hai.

question_en: Is honey good for dengue?
question_ru: Kya shahad dengue me faidemand hai?
answer_en: Honey is safe in adults but not a treatment.
answer_ru: Shahad theek hai lekin ilaj nahi.

question_en: Does lemon water cure dengue?
question_ru: Kya lemon pani dengue ka ilaj hai?
answer_en: No, it only helps hydration.
answer_ru: Nahi, sirf hydration me madad karta hai.

question_en: Does black seed (kalonji) cure dengue?
question_ru: Kya kalonji dengue ka ilaj hai?
answer_en: No herb can replace proper medical care.
answer_ru: Koi herb dengue ka ilaj nahi karta.

question_en: Can dengue cause headache without fever?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bukhar ke baghair sar dard hosakta hai?
answer_en: Rare but possible in early infection.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai magar shuru me hosakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause sore throat?
question_ru: Kya dengue me gala dard hota hai?
answer_en: Occasionally, but it is not a main symptom.
answer_ru: Kabhi kabhi hota hai magar aam nahi.

question_en: Can dengue cause chills?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kapkapi hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, chills occur with fever spikes.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar barhne par kapkapi hosakti hai.

question_en: Is rash itchy?
question_ru: Kya dengue ka rash khujli karta hai?
answer_en: Sometimes, rash may be mildly itchy.
answer_ru: Kabhi kabhi rash me halki kharish hosakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause skin burning?
question_ru: Kya dengue jild me jalan karta hai?
answer_en: Some people feel burning due to fever.
answer_ru: Kuch log bukhar ki wajah se jalan mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Does dengue cause sleep problems?
question_ru: Kya dengue me neend ke maslay hotay hain?
answer_en: Yes, fever and pain disturb sleep.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar aur dard neend ko asar karte hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause anxiety?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bechaini hoti hai?
answer_en: Illness stress and dehydration can cause anxiety.
answer_ru: Stress aur dehydration bechaini paida karte hain.

question_en: Does dengue affect mental clarity?
question_ru: Kya dengue me zehni soch asar hoti hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue can cause confusion—this requires urgent care.
answer_ru: Severe dengue me uljhan hosakti hai—ye urgent care hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause muscle stiffness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pathon me sakhti hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, due to inflammation.
answer_ru: Haan, soozish ki wajah se.

question_en: Does dengue cause leg pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue me taang dard hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, muscle pain often affects legs.
answer_ru: Haan, pathon ka dard taangon me mehsoos hota hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause back pain?
question_ru: Kya dengue me kamar dard hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, body aches commonly include back pain.
answer_ru: Haan, jism dard me kamar ka dard bhi shamil hota hai.

question_en: Is body pain severe?
question_ru: Kya jism dard bohat shadeed hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, dengue often causes intense pain.
answer_ru: Haan, dengue me dard bohat shadeed hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause stomach bloating?
question_ru: Kya dengue me pait phoolta hai?
answer_en: Mild bloating is common; severe bloating is concerning.
answer_ru: Halki phoolan aam; shadeed phoolan par muaina karein.

question_en: Does dengue cause nausea?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ghulati hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, nausea is common.
answer_ru: Haan, ghulati aam hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause vomiting?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ulti hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, but repeated vomiting is a warning sign.
answer_ru: Haan, bar bar ulti khatwarning alamat hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause diarrhea?
question_ru: Kya dengue me dast hotay hain?
answer_en: Loose stools may occur but severe diarrhea is uncommon.
answer_ru: Halki dast hosakti hain magar shadeed kam hoti hain.

question_en: Does dengue cause constipation?
question_ru: Kya dengue me qabz hoti hai?
answer_en: Some patients experience reduced appetite leading to constipation.
answer_ru: Bhook kam lagne se kuch logon me qabz hosakti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause mouth dryness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me mun khushk hota hai?
answer_en: Dry mouth is common due to fever and dehydration.
answer_ru: Mun khushk hona dehydration ki wajah se aam hai.

question_en: Is metallic taste normal?
question_ru: Kya mooh me ajeeb taste aana normal hai?
answer_en: Some patients report altered taste during illness.
answer_ru: Kuch mareez taste me tabdeeli mehsoos karte hain.

question_en: Does dengue cause light sensitivity?
question_ru: Kya dengue me roshni chubhti hai?
answer_en: Yes, due to severe headache.
answer_ru: Haan, shadeed sar dard ki wajah se.

question_en: Can dengue cause blurred vision?
question_ru: Kya dengue me dhundhli nigah hosakti hai?
answer_en: Mild blurring from dehydration may occur; severe changes need evaluation.
answer_ru: Halki dhundh dehydration se; shadeed tabdeeli par muaina karein.

question_en: Does dengue affect hearing?
question_ru: Kya dengue sunai par asar karta hai?
answer_en: Not typically; if hearing changes occur, seek evaluation.
answer_ru: Aam tor par nahi; agar sunai badlaye to muaina karwayen.

question_en: Does dengue cause rashes on palms?
question_ru: Kya haath ki hathon par rash hosakta hai?
answer_en: Yes, rash may appear on limbs and trunk.
answer_ru: Haan, rash haathon aur jism par hosakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause night sweats?
question_ru: Kya dengue me raat ko paseena hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, fever fluctuations cause night sweats.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar ke farq se.

question_en: Does dengue cause slow heartbeat?
question_ru: Kya dengue me dil ki dharkan sust hosakti hai?
answer_en: Rare; if present, needs medical evaluation.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai; agar ho to muaina zaruri hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause fast heartbeat?
question_ru: Kya dengue me dharkan tez hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, from fever and dehydration.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar aur dehydration se.

question_en: Can dengue cause low oxygen?
question_ru: Kya dengue me oxygen kam hosakti hai?
answer_en: Yes, in severe lung involvement or shock.
answer_ru: Haan, severe dengue me.

question_en: Can dengue cause chest heaviness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me seena bhari lagta hai?
answer_en: If chest heaviness occurs, medical assessment is needed.
answer_ru: Agar seena bhaari lage to muaina karein.

question_en: Does dengue cause swelling of legs?
question_ru: Kya paon sooj jate hain?
answer_en: Swelling during leakage needs evaluation.
answer_ru: Leakage me soojan par muaina zaruri hai.

question_en: Is cold skin dangerous?
question_ru: Kya thandi skin khatarnak hai?
answer_en: Cold, clammy skin indicates possible shock—seek emergency care.
answer_ru: Thandi, chipchipi skin shock ka ishara hai—emergency hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause irritability?
question_ru: Kya dengue me chichrhat hoti hai?
answer_en: Irritability may indicate dehydration or worsening illness.
answer_ru: Chichrhat dehydration ya halat bigarnay ki nishani hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause hallucinations?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ajeeb nazaray dikhte hain?
answer_en: Rare; if present, seek urgent evaluation.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai; agar ho to foran muaina karein.

question_en: Can dengue cause dark urine?
question_ru: Kya dengue me peshab ghanay rang ka hota hai?
answer_en: Dark urine indicates dehydration; increase fluids.
answer_ru: Ghana peshab dehydration ki nishani hai—maye barhayen.

question_en: Is fainting a warning sign?
question_ru: Kya behosh hona dengue me khatarnak hai?
answer_en: Yes, fainting suggests poor circulation or dehydration.
answer_ru: Haan, behoshi circulation ya dehydration se hoti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause chills without fever?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bukhar ke bina kapkapi hosakti hai?
answer_en: Usually chills accompany fever, not occur alone.
answer_ru: Aam tor par kapkapi bukhar ke sath hoti hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause confusion?
question_ru: Kya dengue me uljhan hoti hai?
answer_en: Confusion is a red-flag sign—urgent care needed.
answer_ru: Uljhan shadeed alamat hai—foran madad lein.

question_en: Is rash needed to diagnose dengue?
question_ru: Kya rash tashkhis ke liye zaruri hai?
answer_en: No, dengue can occur without rash.
answer_ru: Nahi, rash ke baghair bhi dengue hosakta hai.

question_en: How long does dengue recovery take?
question_ru: Dengue recovery kitni der leti hai?
answer_en: Most patients recover within 2 weeks; fatigue may last longer.
answer_ru: Aksar 2 hafton me behtari hoti hai; thakan zyada arsa reh sakti hai.

question_en: When can I return to work?
question_ru: Kaam par kab wapas ja sakta hoon?
answer_en: When fever stops, hydration is stable, and strength improves.
answer_ru: Jab bukhar khatam ho, hydration theek ho aur taqat aaye.

question_en: Can dengue cause long-term fatigue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me lambi muddat ki thakan hosakti hai?
answer_en: Yes, post-viral fatigue may last weeks.
answer_ru: Haan, post-viral thakan hafton tak chal sakti hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause hair loss?
question_ru: Kya dengue ke baad bal jhadte hain?
answer_en: Temporary hair shedding may occur after severe illness.
answer_ru: Shadeed bimari ke baad bal jhadna hosakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue affect immunity?
question_ru: Kya dengue immunity ko asar karta hai?
answer_en: Immunity may weaken temporarily during illness.
answer_ru: Bimari ke douran immune system kamzor hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause mild swelling?
question_ru: Kya dengue me halki soojan hoti hai?
answer_en: Mild swelling may occur but severe swelling is concerning.
answer_ru: Halki soojan hosakti hai; shadeed soojan khatarnaak hai.

question_en: What happens on day 3 of dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ke din 3 me kya hota hai?
answer_en: Platelets may drop and fever may remain high.
answer_ru: Platelets girna shuru hosakte hain aur bukhar barha reh sakta hai.

question_en: What happens on day 5?
question_ru: Din 5 me kya hota hai?
answer_en: Fever often begins to fall; critical phase may start.
answer_ru: Bukhar girna shuru hota hai; critical phase shuru hosakti hai.

question_en: What happens on day 7?
question_ru: Din 7 me kya hota hai?
answer_en: Most patients exit the critical phase and begin recovery.
answer_ru: Aksar log critical phase se nikal kar recovery me jate hain.

question_en: Can dengue last more than a week?
question_ru: Kya dengue aik haftay se zyada rehta hai?
answer_en: Yes, recovery and fatigue may extend into weeks.
answer_ru: Haan, recovery aur thakan hafton tak ja sakti hai.

question_en: Does dengue affect sleep?
question_ru: Kya dengue neend ko asar karta hai?
answer_en: Yes, fever and pain disturb sleep.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar aur dard neend ko kharab karte hain.

question_en: Can dengue cause tingling?
question_ru: Kya dengue me tingling mehsoos hoti hai?
answer_en: Rare but possible with dehydration or electrolyte imbalance.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai lekin dehydration ya imbalance se.

question_en: Does dengue cause swollen lips?
question_ru: Kya dengue me hont sooj jate hain?
answer_en: Uncommon; if swelling occurs, seek evaluation.
answer_ru: Kam hota hai; ho to muaina karein.

question_en: Does dengue cause fever spikes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me bukhar achanak barhta hai?
answer_en: Yes, fever may rise suddenly in early days.
answer_ru: Haan, shuru me bukhar achanak barh sakta hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause red eyes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me aankhen surkh hoti hain?
answer_en: Mild redness may occur in some patients.
answer_ru: Kuch logon me halki surkhi hosakti hai.

question_en: Is extreme thirst normal?
question_ru: Kya bohat pyaas dengue me aam hai?
answer_en: Yes, due to dehydration from fever.
answer_ru: Haan, bukhar se dehydration hoti hai jo pyaas barhati hai.

question_en: Does dengue cause shakiness?
question_ru: Kya dengue me komp hota hai?
answer_en: Yes, chills can cause shaking.
answer_ru: Haan, kapkapi se komp hosakta hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause rapid breathing?
question_ru: Kya dengue me tez saans hoti hai?
answer_en: Yes, often due to dehydration or respiratory involvement.
answer_ru: Haan, dehydration ya respiratory maslay se.

question_en: Is low BP normal in dengue?
question_ru: Kya kam blood pressure dengue me normal hota hai?
answer_en: No, low BP suggests severe disease.
answer_ru: Nahi, kam BP severe dengue ki nishani hai.

question_en: Does dengue affect urine color?
question_ru: Kya dengue me peshab ka rang badalta hai?
answer_en: Yes, dark urine indicates dehydration.
answer_ru: Haan, ghana rang dehydration dikhata hai.

question_en: Can dengue cause swelling around eyes?
question_ru: Kya dengue me aankhon ke gird soojan hoti hai?
answer_en: Mild swelling may occur; severe swelling needs medical evaluation.
answer_ru: Halki soojan hosakti hai; shadeed soojan par muaina zaruri hai.

question_en: Do Aedes mosquitoes breed indoors?
question_ru: Kya Aedes machar ghar ke andar breed karte hain?
answer_en: Yes, they commonly breed in indoor containers with clean stagnant water.
answer_ru: Haan, yeh aksar ghar ke andar saaf ruke pani ke bartanon me breed karte hain.

question_en: Can Aedes breed in plant trays?
question_ru: Kya Aedes ghamlon ki tray me breed karta hai?
answer_en: Yes, plant trays and small water collections are major breeding hotspots.
answer_ru: Haan, ghamlon ki trays machron ki barray breeding hotspots hoti hain.

question_en: How far can Aedes mosquitoes fly?
question_ru: Aedes machar kitna door urta hai?
answer_en: They typically fly 100–200 meters around homes.
answer_ru: Aam tor par yeh 100–200 meter tak gharon ke aas paas urtay hain.

question_en: Do Aedes mosquitoes prefer humans?
question_ru: Kya Aedes machar insano ko zyada pasand karta hai?
answer_en: Yes, Aedes aegypti prefers human blood and lives near households.
answer_ru: Haan, Aedes aegypti insani khoon pasand karta hai aur gharon ke qareeb rehta hai.

question_en: Are Aedes active at night?
question_ru: Kya Aedes raat ko active hotay hain?
answer_en: They mainly bite during the day, but low-level activity at night can occur indoors.
answer_ru: Yeh zyada tar din me kaat-te hain, magar ghar ke andar raat ko halki activity hosakti hai.

question_en: Can mosquito larvae survive in dirty drains?
question_ru: Kya machar ke larvey ganday drains me zinda rehte hain?
answer_en: Aedes prefer clean stagnant water; dirty drains mostly breed other mosquitoes.
answer_ru: Aedes saaf ruka pani pasand karte hain; ganday drains me aam tor par doosri qisam ke machar hote hain.

question_en: How often should water tanks be cleaned?
question_ru: Water tank kitni dafa saaf karna chahiye?
answer_en: Clean and cover tanks weekly to prevent larvae.
answer_ru: Tankiyon ko hafte me aik martaba saaf aur dhak karen.

question_en: Does chlorine kill mosquito larvae?
question_ru: Kya chlorine larva ko marta hai?
answer_en: Strong chlorine can kill larvae, but source reduction is more reliable.
answer_ru: Tez chlorine larva ko mar sakti hai magar ruka pani khatam karna zyada moassar hai.

question_en: Do fish reduce larvae?
question_ru: Kya machhliyan larva ko kam karte hain?
answer_en: Some fish species eat larvae in ponds, but not suitable for household containers.
answer_ru: Kuch machhliyan talab me larva khati hain magar ghar ke bartanon me yeh amli nahi.

question_en: Is fogging harmful to pets?

answer_ru: Hamal me qareebi nigrani, hydration, NSAIDs se parhez, aur obstetric care ke sath raptah darkar hota hai. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Can dengue occur more than once?
question_ru: Kya dengue dobara ho sakta hai?
answer_en: Yes. Different serotypes exist; later infections can be more severe—continue prevention even after recovery. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Haan. Mukhtalif serotypes hain; dobara infection zyada shadeed ho sakta hai—sehat ke baad bhi bachav jari rakhein. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: What are early symptoms of dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ke ibtidaai alamat kya hain?
answer_en: Early symptoms include high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, muscle and joint aches, nausea/vomiting, and sometimes rash. Watch closely from days 3–7 when warning signs can appear. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Ibtidaai alamat me tez bukhar, shadeed sar dard, aankh ke peeche dard, joron aur pathon ka dard, ulti/ghabrahat aur kabhi kabhi rash shamil hain. Din 3–7 me khatwarning alamat par nazar rakhein. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: What are dengue warning signs that need urgent care?
question_ru: Kon si khatwarning alamat me foran doctor ko dikhana chahiye?
answer_en: Warning signs: severe abdominal pain, persistent vomiting, bleeding (nose/gums, black stools, vomiting blood), fast breathing, extreme tiredness or restlessness, enlarged liver. Seek urgent care. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Khatwarning alamat: shadeed pait ka dard, lagatar ulti, khoon (naak/masoodon se, kaala paikhana, ulti me khoon), tez saans, had se zyada thakan ya bechaini, jigar barhna. Foran doctor ko dikhayen. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: When should I do the NS1 test for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ka NS1 test kis din karwana chahiye?
answer_en: NS1 antigen is most useful in illness days 1–5; after that, IgM/IgG or PCR timing should guide testing. (tip 3)
answer_ru: NS1 antigen pehle 1–5 din me sab se mufeed hota hai; is ke baad IgM/IgG ya PCR ke waqt ke mutabiq test hota hai. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Which pain medicine is safe in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi dard ki dawai mehfooz hai?
answer_en: Use paracetamol/acetaminophen as directed. Avoid aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen and other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Paracetamol/acetaminophen istemal karein. Aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen aur doosray NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra hota hai. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: How should I hydrate at home with dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me ghar par pani kaise pura karun?
answer_en: Take small frequent sips of oral rehydration solution, water, soups and juices. Track urine color and frequency. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Choti choti matra me baar baar ORS, pani, yakhni aur juices lein. Peshab ka rang aur martaba note karein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: What is the critical phase in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me critical phase kya hoti hai?
answer_en: The 24–48 hours after the fever starts to fall (usually days 3–7). Monitor for warning signs and keep fluids adequate. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Bukhar kam honay ke 24–48 ghante (aksar din 3–7) critical phase hoti hai. Khatwarning alamat dekhein aur maye barqarar rakhein. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Do I need platelet transfusion in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me platelet transfusion zaruri hota hai?
answer_en: Not routinely. Transfusion decisions depend on active bleeding and clinical judgment, not just the count number. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Aksar nahi. Transfusion ka faisla sirf number par nahi balkeh khuni alamat aur clinical faislay par hota hai. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Which mosquito spreads dengue and when do they bite?
question_ru: Dengue kis machar se hota hai aur ye kab kaat-te hain?
answer_en: Aedes aegypti/albopictus spread dengue. They bite in daytime, especially early morning and late afternoon—use repellents. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Aedes aegypti/albopictus dengue phailate hain. Ye din me kaat-te hain, khas tor par subah jaldi aur shaam—repellent lagayen. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: How to remove breeding sites at home?
question_ru: Ghar me breeding jagon ko kaise khatam karen?
answer_en: Weekly: empty/scrub/cover water containers, clear gutters, change vase water, check coolers and tires. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Har hafta: bartanon ko khali/saaf/dhak dein, naliyan saaf karein, phooldan ka pani badlein, coolers aur tyres check karein. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: Is there a specific cure or antiviral for dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue ka koi khaas ilaaj ya antiviral hai?
answer_en: No specific routine antiviral. Supportive care (fluids, monitoring, treating complications) is the mainstay. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Koi khaas routine antiviral nahi. Supportive care (maye, nigrani, complications ka ilaj) bunyadi hai. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Is rash required for dengue diagnosis?
question_ru: Kya dengue me rash hona zaruri hai?
answer_en: No. Many patients have rash but not all; rely on overall assessment and appropriate tests. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Nahi. Bohat se mareezon me rash hota hai magar sab me nahi; kul muaina aur munasib tests par bharosa karein. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: What foods are suitable during dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi ghiza munasib hai?
answer_en: Light meals, soups, fruits, and easy-to-digest foods. Prioritize fluids; avoid very sugary or caffeinated drinks if they upset the stomach. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Halka khana, yakhni, phal aur asani se hazm honay wali ghiza. Maye ko ahmiyat dein; bohat meetha ya caffeine pait kharab kare to parhez karein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: When should I go to hospital for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kab hospital jana chahiye?
answer_en: If any warning signs appear, if you cannot keep fluids down, have bleeding, severe abdominal pain, drowsiness, or breathing difficulty. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Agar khatwarning alamat aaen, maye na rukain, khoon aaye, shadeed pait dard, neend/susti ya saans me dushwari ho to hospital jayen. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Is dengue contagious person-to-person?
question_ru: Kya dengue seedha aik se doosray insan ko lagta hai?
answer_en: Dengue spreads via mosquito bites, not normal casual contact. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Dengue aam mulaqat se nahi, balkay machhar ke kaat se phailta hai. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Can I use ibuprofen or aspirin in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ibuprofen ya aspirin le sakta hoon?
answer_en: Avoid ibuprofen/aspirin/other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. Use paracetamol for fever/pain as directed. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Ibuprofen/aspirin/NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra barhta hai. Bukhar/dard ke liye paracetamol istemal karein. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: How do doctors monitor labs in dengue?
question_ru: Doctors dengue me kaun se labs dekhte hain?
answer_en: Complete blood count (hematocrit, platelets) and basic chemistries; trends are more important than a single value. (tip 2)
answer_ru: CBC (hematocrit, platelets) aur bunyadi chemistries; aik value se ziyada rawayya (trend) aham hai. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: What is severe dengue?
question_ru: Severe dengue kya hota hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue involves plasma leakage, bleeding, or organ involvement that may lead to shock—this is a medical emergency. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Severe dengue me plasma leakage, bleeding ya aza ka masla hota hai jo shock tak le ja sakta hai—ye medical emergency hai. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: How to protect children from mosquito bites?
question_ru: Bachon ko machar ke kaat se kaise bachayen?
answer_en: Use age-appropriate repellents, long clothing, screens/bed nets, and remove standing water weekly. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Umar ke mutabiq repellent, lambe kapray, jhalian/bed nets, aur har hafta ruka pani khatam karein. (rehnumai 4)

answer_en: Early symptoms include high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, muscle and joint aches, nausea/vomiting, and sometimes rash. Watch closely from days 3–7 when warning signs can appear. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Ibtidaai alamat me tez bukhar, shadeed sar dard, aankh ke peeche dard, joron aur pathon ka dard, ulti/ghabrahat aur kabhi kabhi rash shamil hain. Din 3–7 me khatwarning alamat par nazar rakhein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: What are dengue warning signs that need urgent care?
question_ru: Kon si khatwarning alamat me foran doctor ko dikhana chahiye?
answer_en: Warning signs: severe abdominal pain, persistent vomiting, bleeding (nose/gums, black stools, vomiting blood), fast breathing, extreme tiredness or restlessness, enlarged liver. Seek urgent care. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Khatwarning alamat: shadeed pait ka dard, lagatar ulti, khoon (naak/masoodon se, kaala paikhana, ulti me khoon), tez saans, had se zyada thakan ya bechaini, jigar barhna. Foran doctor ko dikhayen. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: When should I do the NS1 test for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ka NS1 test kis din karwana chahiye?
answer_en: NS1 antigen is most useful in illness days 1–5; after that, IgM/IgG or PCR timing should guide testing. (tip 7)
answer_ru: NS1 antigen pehle 1–5 din me sab se mufeed hota hai; is ke baad IgM/IgG ya PCR ke waqt ke mutabiq test hota hai. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Which pain medicine is safe in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi dard ki dawai mehfooz hai?
answer_en: Use paracetamol/acetaminophen as directed. Avoid aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen and other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Paracetamol/acetaminophen istemal karein. Aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen aur doosray NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra hota hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: How should I hydrate at home with dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me ghar par pani kaise pura karun?
answer_en: Take small frequent sips of oral rehydration solution, water, soups and juices. Track urine color and frequency. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Choti choti matra me baar baar ORS, pani, yakhni aur juices lein. Peshab ka rang aur martaba note karein. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: What is the critical phase in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me critical phase kya hoti hai?
answer_en: The 24–48 hours after the fever starts to fall (usually days 3–7). Monitor for warning signs and keep fluids adequate. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Bukhar kam honay ke 24–48 ghante (aksar din 3–7) critical phase hoti hai. Khatwarning alamat dekhein aur maye barqarar rakhein. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Do I need platelet transfusion in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me platelet transfusion zaruri hota hai?
answer_en: Not routinely. Transfusion decisions depend on active bleeding and clinical judgment, not just the count number. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Aksar nahi. Transfusion ka faisla sirf number par nahi balkeh khuni alamat aur clinical faislay par hota hai. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: Which mosquito spreads dengue and when do they bite?
question_ru: Dengue kis machar se hota hai aur ye kab kaat-te hain?
answer_en: Aedes aegypti/albopictus spread dengue. They bite in daytime, especially early morning and late afternoon—use repellents. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Aedes aegypti/albopictus dengue phailate hain. Ye din me kaat-te hain, khas tor par subah jaldi aur shaam—repellent lagayen. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: How to remove breeding sites at home?
question_ru: Ghar me breeding jagon ko kaise khatam karen?
answer_en: Weekly: empty/scrub/cover water containers, clear gutters, change vase water, check coolers and tires. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Har hafta: bartanon ko khali/saaf/dhak dein, naliyan saaf karein, phooldan ka pani badlein, coolers aur tyres check karein. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Is there a specific cure or antiviral for dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue ka koi khaas ilaaj ya antiviral hai?
answer_en: No specific routine antiviral. Supportive care (fluids, monitoring, treating complications) is the mainstay. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Koi khaas routine antiviral nahi. Supportive care (maye, nigrani, complications ka ilaj) bunyadi hai. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Is rash required for dengue diagnosis?
question_ru: Kya dengue me rash hona zaruri hai?
answer_en: No. Many patients have rash but not all; rely on overall assessment and appropriate tests. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Nahi. Bohat se mareezon me rash hota hai magar sab me nahi; kul muaina aur munasib tests par bharosa karein. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: What foods are suitable during dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi ghiza munasib hai?
answer_en: Light meals, soups, fruits, and easy-to-digest foods. Prioritize fluids; avoid very sugary or caffeinated drinks if they upset the stomach. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Halka khana, yakhni, phal aur asani se hazm honay wali ghiza. Maye ko ahmiyat dein; bohat meetha ya caffeine pait kharab kare to parhez karein. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: When should I go to hospital for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kab hospital jana chahiye?
answer_en: If any warning signs appear, if you cannot keep fluids down, have bleeding, severe abdominal pain, drowsiness, or breathing difficulty. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Agar khatwarning alamat aaen, maye na rukain, khoon aaye, shadeed pait dard, neend/susti ya saans me dushwari ho to hospital jayen. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Is dengue contagious person-to-person?
question_ru: Kya dengue seedha aik se doosray insan ko lagta hai?
answer_en: Dengue spreads via mosquito bites, not normal casual contact. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Dengue aam mulaqat se nahi, balkay machhar ke kaat se phailta hai. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: Can I use ibuprofen or aspirin in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ibuprofen ya aspirin le sakta hoon?
answer_en: Avoid ibuprofen/aspirin/other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. Use paracetamol for fever/pain as directed. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Ibuprofen/aspirin/NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra barhta hai. Bukhar/dard ke liye paracetamol istemal karein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: How do doctors monitor labs in dengue?
question_ru: Doctors dengue me kaun se labs dekhte hain?
answer_en: Complete blood count (hematocrit, platelets) and basic chemistries; trends are more important than a single value. (tip 6)
answer_ru: CBC (hematocrit, platelets) aur bunyadi chemistries; aik value se ziyada rawayya (trend) aham hai. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: What is severe dengue?
question_ru: Severe dengue kya hota hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue involves plasma leakage, bleeding, or organ involvement that may lead to shock—this is a medical emergency. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Severe dengue me plasma leakage, bleeding ya aza ka masla hota hai jo shock tak le ja sakta hai—ye medical emergency hai. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: How to protect children from mosquito bites?
question_ru: Bachon ko machar ke kaat se kaise bachayen?
answer_en: Use age-appropriate repellents, long clothing, screens/bed nets, and remove standing water weekly. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Umar ke mutabiq repellent, lambe kapray, jhalian/bed nets, aur har hafta ruka pani khatam karein. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: Dengue in pregnancy—any special care?
question_ru: Hamal me dengue—khas ehtiyat kya hai?
answer_en: Pregnancy needs closer monitoring, hydration, avoidance of NSAIDs, and coordination with obstetric care. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Hamal me qareebi nigrani, hydration, NSAIDs se parhez, aur obstetric care ke sath raptah darkar hota hai. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: Can dengue occur more than once?
question_ru: Kya dengue dobara ho sakta hai?
answer_en: Yes. Different serotypes exist; later infections can be more severe—continue prevention even after recovery. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Haan. Mukhtalif serotypes hain; dobara infection zyada shadeed ho sakta hai—sehat ke baad bhi bachav jari rakhein. (rehnumai 3)

answer_ru: Khatwarning alamat: shadeed pait ka dard, lagatar ulti, khoon (naak/masoodon se, kaala paikhana, ulti me khoon), tez saans, had se zyada thakan ya bechaini, jigar barhna. Foran doctor ko dikhayen. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: When should I do the NS1 test for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ka NS1 test kis din karwana chahiye?
answer_en: NS1 antigen is most useful in illness days 1–5; after that, IgM/IgG or PCR timing should guide testing. (tip 4)
answer_ru: NS1 antigen pehle 1–5 din me sab se mufeed hota hai; is ke baad IgM/IgG ya PCR ke waqt ke mutabiq test hota hai. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: Which pain medicine is safe in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi dard ki dawai mehfooz hai?
answer_en: Use paracetamol/acetaminophen as directed. Avoid aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen and other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Paracetamol/acetaminophen istemal karein. Aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen aur doosray NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra hota hai. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: How should I hydrate at home with dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me ghar par pani kaise pura karun?
answer_en: Take small frequent sips of oral rehydration solution, water, soups and juices. Track urine color and frequency. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Choti choti matra me baar baar ORS, pani, yakhni aur juices lein. Peshab ka rang aur martaba note karein. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: What is the critical phase in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me critical phase kya hoti hai?
answer_en: The 24–48 hours after the fever starts to fall (usually days 3–7). Monitor for warning signs and keep fluids adequate. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Bukhar kam honay ke 24–48 ghante (aksar din 3–7) critical phase hoti hai. Khatwarning alamat dekhein aur maye barqarar rakhein. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Do I need platelet transfusion in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me platelet transfusion zaruri hota hai?
answer_en: Not routinely. Transfusion decisions depend on active bleeding and clinical judgment, not just the count number. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Aksar nahi. Transfusion ka faisla sirf number par nahi balkeh khuni alamat aur clinical faislay par hota hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: Which mosquito spreads dengue and when do they bite?
question_ru: Dengue kis machar se hota hai aur ye kab kaat-te hain?
answer_en: Aedes aegypti/albopictus spread dengue. They bite in daytime, especially early morning and late afternoon—use repellents. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Aedes aegypti/albopictus dengue phailate hain. Ye din me kaat-te hain, khas tor par subah jaldi aur shaam—repellent lagayen. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: How to remove breeding sites at home?
question_ru: Ghar me breeding jagon ko kaise khatam karen?
answer_en: Weekly: empty/scrub/cover water containers, clear gutters, change vase water, check coolers and tires. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Har hafta: bartanon ko khali/saaf/dhak dein, naliyan saaf karein, phooldan ka pani badlein, coolers aur tyres check karein. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Is there a specific cure or antiviral for dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue ka koi khaas ilaaj ya antiviral hai?
answer_en: No specific routine antiviral. Supportive care (fluids, monitoring, treating complications) is the mainstay. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Koi khaas routine antiviral nahi. Supportive care (maye, nigrani, complications ka ilaj) bunyadi hai. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: Is rash required for dengue diagnosis?
question_ru: Kya dengue me rash hona zaruri hai?
answer_en: No. Many patients have rash but not all; rely on overall assessment and appropriate tests. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Nahi. Bohat se mareezon me rash hota hai magar sab me nahi; kul muaina aur munasib tests par bharosa karein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: What foods are suitable during dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi ghiza munasib hai?
answer_en: Light meals, soups, fruits, and easy-to-digest foods. Prioritize fluids; avoid very sugary or caffeinated drinks if they upset the stomach. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Halka khana, yakhni, phal aur asani se hazm honay wali ghiza. Maye ko ahmiyat dein; bohat meetha ya caffeine pait kharab kare to parhez karein. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: When should I go to hospital for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kab hospital jana chahiye?
answer_en: If any warning signs appear, if you cannot keep fluids down, have bleeding, severe abdominal pain, drowsiness, or breathing difficulty. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Agar khatwarning alamat aaen, maye na rukain, khoon aaye, shadeed pait dard, neend/susti ya saans me dushwari ho to hospital jayen. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Is dengue contagious person-to-person?
question_ru: Kya dengue seedha aik se doosray insan ko lagta hai?
answer_en: Dengue spreads via mosquito bites, not normal casual contact. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Dengue aam mulaqat se nahi, balkay machhar ke kaat se phailta hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: Can I use ibuprofen or aspirin in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ibuprofen ya aspirin le sakta hoon?
answer_en: Avoid ibuprofen/aspirin/other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. Use paracetamol for fever/pain as directed. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Ibuprofen/aspirin/NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra barhta hai. Bukhar/dard ke liye paracetamol istemal karein. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: How do doctors monitor labs in dengue?
question_ru: Doctors dengue me kaun se labs dekhte hain?
answer_en: Complete blood count (hematocrit, platelets) and basic chemistries; trends are more important than a single value. (tip 3)
answer_ru: CBC (hematocrit, platelets) aur bunyadi chemistries; aik value se ziyada rawayya (trend) aham hai. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: What is severe dengue?
question_ru: Severe dengue kya hota hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue involves plasma leakage, bleeding, or organ involvement that may lead to shock—this is a medical emergency. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Severe dengue me plasma leakage, bleeding ya aza ka masla hota hai jo shock tak le ja sakta hai—ye medical emergency hai. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: How to protect children from mosquito bites?
question_ru: Bachon ko machar ke kaat se kaise bachayen?
answer_en: Use age-appropriate repellents, long clothing, screens/bed nets, and remove standing water weekly. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Umar ke mutabiq repellent, lambe kapray, jhalian/bed nets, aur har hafta ruka pani khatam karein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: Dengue in pregnancy—any special care?
question_ru: Hamal me dengue—khas ehtiyat kya hai?
answer_en: Pregnancy needs closer monitoring, hydration, avoidance of NSAIDs, and coordination with obstetric care. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Hamal me qareebi nigrani, hydration, NSAIDs se parhez, aur obstetric care ke sath raptah darkar hota hai. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Can dengue occur more than once?
question_ru: Kya dengue dobara ho sakta hai?
answer_en: Yes. Different serotypes exist; later infections can be more severe—continue prevention even after recovery. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Haan. Mukhtalif serotypes hain; dobara infection zyada shadeed ho sakta hai—sehat ke baad bhi bachav jari rakhein. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: What are early symptoms of dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ke ibtidaai alamat kya hain?
answer_en: Early symptoms include high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, muscle and joint aches, nausea/vomiting, and sometimes rash. Watch closely from days 3–7 when warning signs can appear. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Ibtidaai alamat me tez bukhar, shadeed sar dard, aankh ke peeche dard, joron aur pathon ka dard, ulti/ghabrahat aur kabhi kabhi rash shamil hain. Din 3–7 me khatwarning alamat par nazar rakhein. (rehnumai 1)

answer_ru: NS1 antigen pehle 1–5 din me sab se mufeed hota hai; is ke baad IgM/IgG ya PCR ke waqt ke mutabiq test hota hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: Which pain medicine is safe in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi dard ki dawai mehfooz hai?
answer_en: Use paracetamol/acetaminophen as directed. Avoid aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen and other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Paracetamol/acetaminophen istemal karein. Aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen aur doosray NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra hota hai. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: How should I hydrate at home with dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me ghar par pani kaise pura karun?
answer_en: Take small frequent sips of oral rehydration solution, water, soups and juices. Track urine color and frequency. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Choti choti matra me baar baar ORS, pani, yakhni aur juices lein. Peshab ka rang aur martaba note karein. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: What is the critical phase in dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me critical phase kya hoti hai?
answer_en: The 24–48 hours after the fever starts to fall (usually days 3–7). Monitor for warning signs and keep fluids adequate. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Bukhar kam honay ke 24–48 ghante (aksar din 3–7) critical phase hoti hai. Khatwarning alamat dekhein aur maye barqarar rakhein. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: Do I need platelet transfusion in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me platelet transfusion zaruri hota hai?
answer_en: Not routinely. Transfusion decisions depend on active bleeding and clinical judgment, not just the count number. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Aksar nahi. Transfusion ka faisla sirf number par nahi balkeh khuni alamat aur clinical faislay par hota hai. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: Which mosquito spreads dengue and when do they bite?
question_ru: Dengue kis machar se hota hai aur ye kab kaat-te hain?
answer_en: Aedes aegypti/albopictus spread dengue. They bite in daytime, especially early morning and late afternoon—use repellents. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Aedes aegypti/albopictus dengue phailate hain. Ye din me kaat-te hain, khas tor par subah jaldi aur shaam—repellent lagayen. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: How to remove breeding sites at home?
question_ru: Ghar me breeding jagon ko kaise khatam karen?
answer_en: Weekly: empty/scrub/cover water containers, clear gutters, change vase water, check coolers and tires. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Har hafta: bartanon ko khali/saaf/dhak dein, naliyan saaf karein, phooldan ka pani badlein, coolers aur tyres check karein. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: Is there a specific cure or antiviral for dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue ka koi khaas ilaaj ya antiviral hai?
answer_en: No specific routine antiviral. Supportive care (fluids, monitoring, treating complications) is the mainstay. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Koi khaas routine antiviral nahi. Supportive care (maye, nigrani, complications ka ilaj) bunyadi hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: Is rash required for dengue diagnosis?
question_ru: Kya dengue me rash hona zaruri hai?
answer_en: No. Many patients have rash but not all; rely on overall assessment and appropriate tests. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Nahi. Bohat se mareezon me rash hota hai magar sab me nahi; kul muaina aur munasib tests par bharosa karein. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: What foods are suitable during dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi ghiza munasib hai?
answer_en: Light meals, soups, fruits, and easy-to-digest foods. Prioritize fluids; avoid very sugary or caffeinated drinks if they upset the stomach. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Halka khana, yakhni, phal aur asani se hazm honay wali ghiza. Maye ko ahmiyat dein; bohat meetha ya caffeine pait kharab kare to parhez karein. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: When should I go to hospital for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kab hospital jana chahiye?
answer_en: If any warning signs appear, if you cannot keep fluids down, have bleeding, severe abdominal pain, drowsiness, or breathing difficulty. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Agar khatwarning alamat aaen, maye na rukain, khoon aaye, shadeed pait dard, neend/susti ya saans me dushwari ho to hospital jayen. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: Is dengue contagious person-to-person?
question_ru: Kya dengue seedha aik se doosray insan ko lagta hai?
answer_en: Dengue spreads via mosquito bites, not normal casual contact. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Dengue aam mulaqat se nahi, balkay machhar ke kaat se phailta hai. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: Can I use ibuprofen or aspirin in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ibuprofen ya aspirin le sakta hoon?
answer_en: Avoid ibuprofen/aspirin/other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. Use paracetamol for fever/pain as directed. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Ibuprofen/aspirin/NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra barhta hai. Bukhar/dard ke liye paracetamol istemal karein. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: How do doctors monitor labs in dengue?
question_ru: Doctors dengue me kaun se labs dekhte hain?
answer_en: Complete blood count (hematocrit, platelets) and basic chemistries; trends are more important than a single value. (tip 7)
answer_ru: CBC (hematocrit, platelets) aur bunyadi chemistries; aik value se ziyada rawayya (trend) aham hai. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: What is severe dengue?
question_ru: Severe dengue kya hota hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue involves plasma leakage, bleeding, or organ involvement that may lead to shock—this is a medical emergency. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Severe dengue me plasma leakage, bleeding ya aza ka masla hota hai jo shock tak le ja sakta hai—ye medical emergency hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: How to protect children from mosquito bites?
question_ru: Bachon ko machar ke kaat se kaise bachayen?
answer_en: Use age-appropriate repellents, long clothing, screens/bed nets, and remove standing water weekly. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Umar ke mutabiq repellent, lambe kapray, jhalian/bed nets, aur har hafta ruka pani khatam karein. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: Dengue in pregnancy—any special care?
question_ru: Hamal me dengue—khas ehtiyat kya hai?
answer_en: Pregnancy needs closer monitoring, hydration, avoidance of NSAIDs, and coordination with obstetric care. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Hamal me qareebi nigrani, hydration, NSAIDs se parhez, aur obstetric care ke sath raptah darkar hota hai. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Can dengue occur more than once?
question_ru: Kya dengue dobara ho sakta hai?
answer_en: Yes. Different serotypes exist; later infections can be more severe—continue prevention even after recovery. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Haan. Mukhtalif serotypes hain; dobara infection zyada shadeed ho sakta hai—sehat ke baad bhi bachav jari rakhein. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: What are early symptoms of dengue?
question_ru: Dengue ke ibtidaai alamat kya hain?
answer_en: Early symptoms include high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, muscle and joint aches, nausea/vomiting, and sometimes rash. Watch closely from days 3–7 when warning signs can appear. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Ibtidaai alamat me tez bukhar, shadeed sar dard, aankh ke peeche dard, joron aur pathon ka dard, ulti/ghabrahat aur kabhi kabhi rash shamil hain. Din 3–7 me khatwarning alamat par nazar rakhein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: What are dengue warning signs that need urgent care?
question_ru: Kon si khatwarning alamat me foran doctor ko dikhana chahiye?
answer_en: Warning signs: severe abdominal pain, persistent vomiting, bleeding (nose/gums, black stools, vomiting blood), fast breathing, extreme tiredness or restlessness, enlarged liver. Seek urgent care. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Khatwarning alamat: shadeed pait ka dard, lagatar ulti, khoon (naak/masoodon se, kaala paikhana, ulti me khoon), tez saans, had se zyada thakan ya bechaini, jigar barhna. Foran doctor ko dikhayen. (rehnumai 6)
