answer_ru: Bukhar kam honay ke 24–48 ghante (aksar din 3–7) critical phase hoti hai. Khatwarning alamat dekhein aur maye barqarar rakhein. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: Do I need platelet transfusion in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me platelet transfusion zaruri hota hai?
answer_en: Not routinely. Transfusion decisions depend on active bleeding and clinical judgment, not just the count number. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Aksar nahi. Transfusion ka faisla sirf number par nahi balkeh khuni alamat aur clinical faislay par hota hai. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Which mosquito spreads dengue and when do they bite?
question_ru: Dengue kis machar se hota hai aur ye kab kaat-te hain?
answer_en: Aedes aegypti/albopictus spread dengue. They bite in daytime, especially early morning and late afternoon—use repellents. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Aedes aegypti/albopictus dengue phailate hain. Ye din me kaat-te hain, khas tor par subah jaldi aur shaam—repellent lagayen. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: How to remove breeding sites at home?
question_ru: Ghar me breeding jagon ko kaise khatam karen?
answer_en: Weekly: empty/scrub/cover water containers, clear gutters, change vase water, check coolers and tires. (tip 1)
answer_ru: Har hafta: bartanon ko khali/saaf/dhak dein, naliyan saaf karein, phooldan ka pani badlein, coolers aur tyres check karein. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: Is there a specific cure or antiviral for dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue ka koi khaas ilaaj ya antiviral hai?
answer_en: No specific routine antiviral. Supportive care (fluids, monitoring, treating complications) is the mainstay. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Koi khaas routine antiviral nahi. Supportive care (maye, nigrani, complications ka ilaj) bunyadi hai. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: Is rash required for dengue diagnosis?
question_ru: Kya dengue me rash hona zaruri hai?
answer_en: No. Many patients have rash but not all; rely on overall assessment and appropriate tests. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Nahi. Bohat se mareezon me rash hota hai magar sab me nahi; kul muaina aur munasib tests par bharosa karein. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: What foods are suitable during dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kaunsi ghiza munasib hai?
answer_en: Light meals, soups, fruits, and easy-to-digest foods. Prioritize fluids; avoid very sugary or caffeinated drinks if they upset the stomach. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Halka khana, yakhni, phal aur asani se hazm honay wali ghiza. Maye ko ahmiyat dein; bohat meetha ya caffeine pait kharab kare to parhez karein. (rehnumai 4)

question_en: When should I go to hospital for dengue?
question_ru: Dengue me kab hospital jana chahiye?
answer_en: If any warning signs appear, if you cannot keep fluids down, have bleeding, severe abdominal pain, drowsiness, or breathing difficulty. (tip 5)
answer_ru: Agar khatwarning alamat aaen, maye na rukain, khoon aaye, shadeed pait dard, neend/susti ya saans me dushwari ho to hospital jayen. (rehnumai 5)

question_en: Is dengue contagious person-to-person?
question_ru: Kya dengue seedha aik se doosray insan ko lagta hai?
answer_en: Dengue spreads via mosquito bites, not normal casual contact. (tip 6)
answer_ru: Dengue aam mulaqat se nahi, balkay machhar ke kaat se phailta hai. (rehnumai 6)

question_en: Can I use ibuprofen or aspirin in dengue?
question_ru: Kya dengue me ibuprofen ya aspirin le sakta hoon?
answer_en: Avoid ibuprofen/aspirin/other NSAIDs due to bleeding risk. Use paracetamol for fever/pain as directed. (tip 7)
answer_ru: Ibuprofen/aspirin/NSAIDs se parhez kyun ke bleeding ka khatra barhta hai. Bukhar/dard ke liye paracetamol istemal karein. (rehnumai 7)

question_en: How do doctors monitor labs in dengue?
question_ru: Doctors dengue me kaun se labs dekhte hain?
answer_en: Complete blood count (hematocrit, platelets) and basic chemistries; trends are more important than a single value. (tip 1)
answer_ru: CBC (hematocrit, platelets) aur bunyadi chemistries; aik value se ziyada rawayya (trend) aham hai. (rehnumai 1)

question_en: What is severe dengue?
question_ru: Severe dengue kya hota hai?
answer_en: Severe dengue involves plasma leakage, bleeding, or organ involvement that may lead to shock—this is a medical emergency. (tip 2)
answer_ru: Severe dengue me plasma leakage, bleeding ya aza ka masla hota hai jo shock tak le ja sakta hai—ye medical emergency hai. (rehnumai 2)

question_en: How to protect children from mosquito bites?
question_ru: Bachon ko machar ke kaat se kaise bachayen?
answer_en: Use age-appropriate repellents, long clothing, screens/bed nets, and remove standing water weekly. (tip 3)
answer_ru: Umar ke mutabiq repellent, lambe kapray, jhalian/bed nets, aur har hafta ruka pani khatam karein. (rehnumai 3)

question_en: Dengue in pregnancy—any special care?
question_ru: Hamal me dengue—khas ehtiyat kya hai?
answer_en: Pregnancy needs closer monitoring, hydration, avoidance of NSAIDs, and coordination with obstetric care. (tip 4)
answer_ru: Hamal me qareebi nigrani, hydration, NSAIDs se parhez, aur obstetric care ke sath raptah darkar hota hai. (rehnumai 4)
